home.heroText: designed to handle millions of messages per second, while ensuring seamless real-time data processing for high-demand industries

liliac.title: Backend​ Solutions​ Development
liliac.heading: We specialize in building high-performance, scalable backend systems designed to handle heavy workloads and large-scale traffic.
liliac.benefits1: Capacity: Processes up to 5 million messages per second, ensuring smooth operation during peak loads.
liliac.benefits2: Big Data Handling: Efficiently manages billions of records.

orange.title: Web & Mobile​ Application​ Development
orange.heading: Designed for optimal user experience, modern web and mobile applications combine intuitive interfaces with high performance
orange.benefits1: PWA & Responsive Design: App-like performance on all devices.
orange.benefits2: SSR with Next.js: Faster loads and better SEO.
orange.benefits4: Real-time Features: Live chats, notifications, and updates via WebSockets and GraphQL.
orange.benefits5: Big Data Handling: Efficiently manages billions of records.

card.title: Design & User​ Experience
card.heading: We create clean, intuitive designs that enhance user experience. From websites to apps, we focus on aesthetics, functionality, and accessibility for a seamless user journey.

blue.title: DevOps​ & Automation
blue.heading: Full-cycle DevOps services ensure automated deployment and streamlined development processes.
blue.benefits1: Automation & CI/CD: Streamlined deployment with continuous integration and delivery.
blue.benefits2: Scalability & Security: Efficiently managing high-load systems with robust security practices throughout the deployment pipeline.
blue.benefits3: Reliability: Continuous monitoring and quick recovery to minimize downtime

lime.title: Game & Web3​ Platform​ Development
lime.heading: Solutions for blockchain platforms and the gaming industry provide Web3 integration and real-time transactions, ensuring a decentralized experience
lime.benefits1: Web3 & Smart Contracts: Decentralized gaming with secure, automated transactions.
lime.benefits3: Scalability & Security: Built for growth with strong security.

cardDark.title: Seamless​ Integration​ Across​ All Systems
cardDark.heading: Ensuring efficient integration across any platform, service, or technology stack. From legacy systems to modern APIs, cloud services, and third-party tools, we cover all your business needs

desktop.row1: We are <blue>flexible and collaborate</blue> with trusted
desktop.row2: partners to bring your <lime>vision to life</lime>. While we
desktop.row3: specialize in key areas, we’re open to exploring

cards.EventStripe: The company developed a SaaS platform, EventStripe, designed for ticket sales at events, supporting high burst loads of up to 10,000 sessions. The project leverages modern technologies such as Next.js, Java 20, Spring, Docker, Kubernetes, and monitoring tools like Jenkins, ELK, and Grafana. The primary focus was to ensure system stability under high loads and provide scalability flexibility.
cards.VTB: A real-time data streaming system was developed for VTB Bank, capable of processing millions of messages per second. The project utilizes a tech stack based on Java 17, Spring, Kafka, PostgreSQL, as well as containerization and orchestration through Docker and Kubernetes. The solution enables real-time processing of vast amounts of data and ensures high performance for financial sector tasks.
cards.Sber: A microservice architecture, including a biometric authorization system, was designed and implemented for Sber. The solution covers key client functions such as document generation, session tracking, and asynchronous integration with data spaces and other systems. The project is built using Spring, Java 17, Oracle, Docker, and Kubernetes for container management and scalability.
cards.Societe: A personalized advertising system for credit products was developed for Societe Generale Bank. The system includes a banner service, credit conveyor, and API for integration with external systems. The core technologies used include Java 11, Spring, Oracle, Docker, Kubernetes, and Jenkins for CI/CD processes. The project aims to improve customer engagement and automate credit operations.
cards.Architectural: UX/UI website design for an architectural bureau. MIR globally transforms space and influences the cultural code, forming a new world.
cards.KClub: A company in the leisure and tourism sector, for which we created a website with booking functionalities. The design was provided by the client, and we used Java for the backend logic and Next.js for the frontend, allowing us to create a fast and user-friendly service with excellent performance.
cards.Matahari: A project for an upscale residential complex with integrated interactive maps and multimedia content. The design was provided by the client, and we used Kotlin and Rust for backend reliability and security, while the dynamic interface was created with React and Vue.js.
cards.Mirage: A project for creating unique dynamic websites that combine creative design with cutting-edge technology. The design was provided by the client, and we used Java/Kotlin and Go for the backend, and React for the frontend, ensuring a high level of user interaction and fast data processing.
cards.Frigate: Development of an e-commerce site for a surfboard manufacturer, focusing on fast page load times and an intuitive user interface. The design was provided by the client, and the backend was built with Go and Rust, while the frontend was developed with Vue and TypeScript. We also implemented solutions for scalability and process automation.
cards.Ntainers: An Australia StartUp project designed to manage and streamline container logistics. The design was provided by the client, and the backend was built with Go for performance and scalability. The frontend was developed using React for a seamless user experience, ensuring efficient management and tracking of containers.

lyrics.l1: We focus on delivering scalable, secure, and innovative solutions
lyrics.l2: across web, mobile, and blockchain platforms
lyrics.l3: With expertise in seamless integration, DevOps automation, and UX/UI design
lyrics.l4: we transform complex challenges into efficient digital products

person.desc1: A web and UI/UX design expert, bringing bold and engaging digital experiences to life for clients through creative and impactful solutions.
person.desc2: Kotlin Backend Developer with a strong background in blockchain and Web3 technologies, focusing on scalable solutions for the gaming industry.
person.desc3: Full-Stack Developer with 6 years of experience in web applications. Skilled in Python, Flask, .NET, CargoWise, AWS, and specializing in e-commerce, blockchain, and secure, user-friendly solutions.
person.desc4: Over 7 years of experience in fintech, specializing in high-load system development.
person.desc5: Programming since 1988, expert in DevOps since its emergence in 2009.
person.desc6: 6 years of experience in frontend development with a focus on progressive web applications (PWA).
